education.institution: CEU SAN PABLO UNIVERSITY, MADRID, SPAIN
education.degree: Degrees in Digital Communication, PR, and Advertising
education.description: Studies in digital communication aimed at developing the necessary skills for the comprehensive management of a digital project or product, as well as the fundamentals of programming, databases, and the different technologies and disciplines required to lead a technological project.

education.institution: HANZE UNIVERSITY OF APPLIED SCIENCES - GRONINGEN, NETHERLANDS
education.degree: Master: The Future of Technology and Society
education.description: Focused on the creation and management of digital projects. Our project: An innovative prototype to manage the mobility and transportation of the society of the future (Netherlands in 2050) and presentation through the use of VR and AR technologies.

Bootcamp program focused on application development in JavaScript and TypeScript, Angular and Ionic. Microservices in Node.js. Creation and management of databases in MongoDB and MySQL. Application deployment and continuous integration, AWS.

phrases: I have never pretended to be asleep to avoid an awkward situation.
I have never accidentally sent a message to my ex.
I have never entered a place without paying.
I have never made a prank call.
I have never left a restaurant without paying.
I have never cheated on a test.
I have never kissed someone just for fun.
I have never pretended to be someone else on social media.
I have never tried on a provocative costume just for fun.
I have never played truth or dare and chosen dare.
I have never broken something and pretended it wasn't me.
I have never left without letting my parents know.
I have never lied about my age.
I have never tried to sneak into a concert.
I have never used someone else's toothbrush without permission.
I have never hidden something in my room so it wouldn't be found.
I have never used the excuse 'I forgot' when I actually hadn't forgotten.
I have never accidentally sent a racy message to a family member.
I have never used a fake ID.
I have never dated someone out of boredom.
I have never pulled a prank and blamed someone else.
I have never walked out of a movie because I was bored.
I have never flirted to get something for free.
I have never played a tasteless prank.
I have never snooped through my partner's phone.
I have never said 'I love you' just to get something.
I have never worn the same underwear two days in a row.
I have never pretended to be sick to avoid work or school.
I have never dated someone just for their money or benefits.
I have never made up an emergency to get out of an awkward situation.
I have never eaten food from a broken plate.

yonunca.instruccionJugar: Just press the button to advance to the next phrase and play the most fun game, Never Have I Ever.
yonunca.tituloReglas: Rules of the Never Have I Ever Game
yonunca.descripcionObjetivo: The game consists of saying things you have never done. If someone in the group has done it, they must take a drink or perform a predefined action.
yonunca.pasosJuego_1: Players sit in a circle or around a table.
yonunca.pasosJuego_2: One of the players starts by saying something they have never done using the phrase 'Never have I ever...' (for example, 'Never have I ever gone skydiving').
yonunca.pasosJuego_3: Players who have done that action must take a drink or perform an action agreed upon beforehand.
yonunca.pasosJuego_4: The next player continues with another 'Never have I ever...' statement and so on.
yonunca.descripcionFinJuego: The game can end whenever the players want or when everyone is having enough fun.
yonunca.desarrolloAplicacion_contenido_1: Design and Development of the Never Have I Ever App
yonunca.juegoMesa_titulo: Board Game 'Never Have I Ever Revolution'

siro.ayudaTrabajo: Pues un montonazo de cosas. ya verás. ¿Me puedes ayudar tu dándome un buen trabajo?
siro.infoServiciosWeb: También ofrecemos una variedad de servicios de Desarrollo web y comunicación Digital.
siro.respuestaRegularDia: No está mal, gracias por preguntar
siro.respuestaAsistente2: No está mal, gracias por preguntar

siro2.speech: Well, I can do a lot of things. You'll see. Can you help me by giving me a good job?

subResponses.speech: We also offer a variety of web development and Digital Communication services.
Well, among my most requested services are:
My over 3 years of experience in web application development using state-of-the-art development frameworks
You can get in touch with me by sending me an email, calling me, or contacting me on LinkedIn
I specialize in Angular, Ionic, React, and Flutter
My 5 years of university studies allow me to have a very broad and professional vision of different digital communication and marketing services
You can see all my work in my bijains portfolio
You can see all my work in my bijains portfolio
We offer a backend development service using the latest tools
You can get in touch with me by sending me an email, calling me, or contacting me on LinkedIn
Just send me a message, and I'll see when I respond, hahaha, just kidding, you can contact me by phone during office hours
Greetings! I'm Fran Martinez, your virtual assistant, and also the creator of this page.
I'm here to answer questions or help you with whatever you need. How can I assist you today?
My day is fantastic! Thanks for asking. How about yours?
I'm glad to hear that! Is there something specific I can help you with?
I hope it gets better! How can I help you today?
Sure! Did you know that programmers don't eat ice cream because it always melts?
I'm glad it brought a smile to your face! How else can I assist you?

subResponses.text: You need to improve your jokes
subResponses.speech: I'll try! But now, how else can I assist you?
My code is like a digital work of art, an impressive job!
There's always room for improvement! Have you thought about giving me a call?
Great! If you need more suggestions, I'm here.
You're welcome! I'm always here to help you improve.

subResponses.text: Do you have any secret tricks?
subResponses.speech: Of course! One of my favorites is... have you ever tried...?
You should give it a try! You'd be surprised how useful it can be!

subResponses.text: Yes, I'll use it more often!
subResponses.speech: That's great! It's always good to share tricks!
